doc:
Robert Lamoureux https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Lamoureux 0 Robert Lamoureux (4 January 1920 – 29 October 2011) was a French actor, screenwriter and film director. He appeared in 37 films between 1951 and 1994. He starred in the film The Adventures of Arsène Lupin, which was entered into the 7th Berlin International Film Festival. Robert_Lamoureux ( 4_January_1920 – 29_October_2011 ) was a_French_actor_,_screenwriter_and_film_director . He appeared in 37_films between 1951_and_1994 . He starred in the_film The_Adventures of Arsène_Lupin , which was_entered into the_7th_Berlin_International_Film_Festival .
